mapper.insert: INSERT INTO cmt VALUES ( seq_cmt_no.NEXTVAL, #{nanumNo}, #{content}, sysdate )
mapper.select: select c.commentNo, c.nanumNo, u.userName, c.content, to_char(c.regdate,'YYYY-MM-DD') regdate from cmt c , nanum n , users u where n.nanumNo = #{nanumNo} and c.nanumNo = n.nanumNo and n.userNo = u.userNo
